import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Email from '../Svg/Email'; import Phone from '../Svg/Phone'; import Location from '../Svg/Location'; import './Card.css' import axios from 'axios'; function Card() { const [user, setUser] = useState(false) const getRandomUser = () => { axios.get("https://randomuser.me/api/").then((response) => { console.log(response.data.results[0]) setUser(response.data.results[0]) }) } return (
